sense.def:
The salvation of a person
je v krščanski veri dejstvo, da je Kristus človeka rešil pred hudim.

The salvation of someone or something
je reševanje tiste osebe ali stvari pred neprijetno usodo.

seg.quote: The country's salvation was of immense importance.

sense.def:
One's salvation
je oseba ali stvar, ki ima zasluge za to, da se nekdo izogne neprijetnemu položaju ali trpljenju.

seg.quote: Small industries will be the salvation of many areas now in decline.
Their children were their only salvation.
